rows.label: qst003402_msg0002
rows.name:
I see... You broke the water
tower to escape from the
Superbian soldiers...

rows.label: qst003402_msg0003
rows.name:
So what... In the end,
it was their fault.

rows.label: qst003402_msg0004
rows.name: In that case, we can't blame you.

rows.label: qst003402_msg0005
rows.name:
Can't be helped. We were both
trying to stand up to a power
that was just too strong for us.

rows.label: qst003402_msg0006
rows.name:
Besides... you're the ones who brought
us the Melosian Honey, right?

rows.label: qst003402_msg0007
rows.name:
My daughter's a picky eater,
but... she happily eats Ruska if
it's made with Melosian Honey.

rows.label: qst003402_msg0008
rows.name:
For the honey's sake, I'll let
the water tower incident slide.

rows.label: qst003402_msg0009
rows.name:
But next time you do something to those
Superbian bastards, try to do it in a way
that doesn't cause us trouble, alright?
